agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will meet to consider the following bills: HB 478 Phelan Relating to the funding of flood planning, mitigation, and infrastructure projects. HJR 81 Phelan Proposing a constitutional amendment providing for the creation of the flood infrastructure fund to assist in the financing of drainage, flood mitigation, and flood control projects. HB 726 Larson Relating to the regulation of groundwater. HB 925 Springer Relating to the composition of the board of directors of the Gateway Groundwater Conservation District. HB 1044 Zwiener Relating to permits for certain injection wells that transect a portion of the Edwards Aquifer. HB 1066 Ashby Relating to extensions of an expired permit for the transfer of groundwater from a groundwater conservation district. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
